io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network

Class AESEventEncrypter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.AbstractEventEncrypter
      • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network.AESEventEncrypter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventEncrypter

    public class AESEventEncrypter
extends AbstractEventEncrypter
    Encrypts the EventEnvelope content using the AES algorithm.

    To define the key you need to specify the binding NetworkConfig.

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel
